summary: This batch represents work across multiple product teams including pet food subscription (TPT), Factor meal service (MIO), and RTE systems. Major themes include A/B testing for portion percentages, Shopify migration for Factor Form, team restructuring for the new MIO squad, and various bug fixes for OTP (one-time purchase) functionality and delivery management.

decisions.what: Move breed message below breed selection for accessibility
decisions.rationale: Sprig feedback showed new breed popup impacts accessibility for users with very small screens or increased font sizes

decisions.what: Implement ABC experiment with one control and two variations for portion percentage
decisions.rationale: Testing multiple portion percentage variations to optimize plan selection

decisions.what: Redirect legacy Factor Form customers to Shopify instance
decisions.rationale: Migrating Factor Form from legacy system to Shopify platform

decisions.what: Remove deliveryInterval field from changePlanDeliveryDetails API
decisions.rationale: deliveryInterval field conflicts with CDPS cadence values

decisions.what: Transition from squad-specific Slack channels to unified #squad-market-io channel
decisions.rationale: Team restructuring to form new Market Innovation & Optimization (MIO) squad

initiatives.name: Portion Percentage Experiment (TPT-2175)
initiatives.description: Implementing A/B testing for portion percentage selection on plan cards, ensuring correct data flow to checkout and pet profiles

initiatives.name: Shopify Factor Form Migration (MIO-13)
initiatives.description: Migrating Factor Form from legacy system to Shopify, including domain setup, redirects, and SEO considerations

initiatives.name: MIO Team Restructuring (MIO-14)
initiatives.description: Configuring new Market Innovation & Optimization squad structure, including Slack channel updates and service migrations

initiatives.name: OTP (One-Time Purchase) Improvements (RTEVMS-1323)
initiatives.description: Bug fixes and UX improvements for one-time purchase functionality including CTA behavior and UI consistency

initiatives.name: Plan Type Switching Feature (MIO-1)
initiatives.description: Enabling HelloFresh and Green Chef customers to switch between Classic and Premium plans, including comparison UI

blockers.description: 503 errors spike in Nutritional Profile Service starting December 2nd
blockers.impact: Service reliability and customer experience for nutritional profile functionality

blockers.description: Manual partition migration required for NVS and RTE Systems services
blockers.impact: No automatic mechanism available, old partition will be frozen during migration

blockers.description: Dependency on GOC-3383 for Consumer Core team
blockers.impact: Blocking Consumer Core work, ETA requested by Ahmed ElSebaei

technical_patterns.pattern: A/B/C experimentation with control and multiple variations
technical_patterns.context: Used for testing portion percentage options to optimize conversion and user experience
Required for NVS and RTE Systems services due to lack of automatic migration mechanism

technical_patterns.pattern: Domain migration with DNS record updates (A and CNAME records)
technical_patterns.context: Standard approach for connecting custom domains to Shopify instances

technical_patterns.pattern: API field removal to resolve system conflicts
technical_patterns.context: Removing deliveryInterval field that conflicts with CDPS cadence values

technical_patterns.pattern: Sticky CTA with full-width container for mobile/web consistency
technical_patterns.context: UI pattern for improving conversion on OTP bundle dialogs

technical_patterns.pattern: Conditional CTA enabling based on form validation state
technical_patterns.context: Preventing order placement when required address information is not saved
Documenting 4xx and 5xx error handling procedures for reactivation flows
Moving UI elements to accommodate users with small screens or increased font sizes

work_themes: API cleanup and technical debt reduction

dependencies.context: Waiting on deliveryInterval field removal from API (GOC-3383)
Domain configuration and DNS setup required for migration completion
Manual partition migration support needed for NVS and RTE Systems services
Correct SKU and portion percentage data must flow from plan selection to checkout
Order placement depends on saved address validation
